author: USA TODAY, Marco della Cava, USA TODAY
title: 'Life may change for us all': How we respond to the coronavirus crisis will reshape US history
description: The coronavirus has quickly become a defining moment for the nation. But whether it is a new 9/11 or a looming Great Depression is partly up to us.
content:
When historians mark the start of this nation's coronavirus nightmare, they will cite Jan. 21, 2020, the date a Washington state man in his 30s who had visited Wuhan, China, was confirmed as the United States' first COVID-19 case.
Since then, this global cri… [+10591 chars]
